verses.text: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* same \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* part \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H5973"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* oblations,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w else|strong="H3808"\w*. \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priestâ€™s|strong="H3548"\w* \w due|strong="H4941"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* victims: \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H2220"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* breast:

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* firstfruits also \w of|strong="H7225"\w* corn, \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* part \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wool \w from|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w shearing|strong="H1488"\w* \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H8179"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* dwelleth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* longing \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*,

\w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* time \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H4465"\w* receive \w the|strong="H5921"\w* same \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w food|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rest do: \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w that|strong="H0001"\w* which \w is|strong="H0001"\w* \w due|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own city, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* succession \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, beware lest thou \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* imitate \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* expiate \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, making \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* consulteth soothsayers, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* observeth dreams \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w omens|strong="H7080"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* wizard,

\w Nor|strong="H0413"\w* charmer, \w nor|strong="H0413"\w* any \w one|strong="H2266"\w* \w that|strong="H4191"\w* consulteth pythonic spirits, \w or|strong="H4191"\w* fortune tellers, \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H4191"\w* seeketh \w the|strong="H0413"\w* truth \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* abhorreth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* thy coming.

Thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w without|strong="H8549"\w* spot \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* land thou shalt \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*, hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* soothsayers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w otherwise|strong="H3808"\w* instructed \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w PROPHET|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy nation \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w him|strong="H0413"\w* thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*:

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* thou desiredst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6951"\w* \w together|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* saidst: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, lest \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* all \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* revenger.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w being|strong="H8034"\w* corrupted \w with|strong="H1696"\w* pride, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* slain.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* silent \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* thou \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*: \w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

Thou shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* sign: Whatsoever \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* foretelleth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* cometh \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* hath forged \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w pride|strong="H2087"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*.
